label: Is Link Alive
description: Checks all external links found in the Markdown content to verify they are reachable and return an allowed HTTP status code.
rationale: Ensures that external references remain valid, preventing broken or outdated links that reduce credibility and user experience.

requiresPrevious.message: The previous step must extract externallink from Markdown content at document scope so that links can be checked.

timeout.description: Request timeout in milliseconds for each link check.

allowed_status_codes.description: List of acceptable HTTP status codes for a link to be considered alive.
